text: 就想說這個可能就是一個機會讓我去試一試不一樣的東西
pinyin: jiù xiǎng shuō zhè gè kě néng jiù shì yī gè jī huì ràng wǒ qù shì yī shì bù yī yàng de dōng xī
english: I just want to say that this might be an opportunity for me to try something different.

text: 你知道現在新加坡對馬來西亞的匯率是多少嗎
pinyin: nǐ zhī dào xiàn zài xīn jiā pō duì mǎ lái xī yà de huì lǜ shì duō shǎo ma
english: Do you know what the exchange rate between Singapore and Malaysia is now?

text: 怎麼樣講身為一個爸爸都一定要負起一點責任
pinyin: zěn me yàng jiǎng shēn wèi yī gè bà bà dōu yí dìng yào fù qǐ yī diǎn zé rèn
english: How do you say that as a father, you must take some responsibility?

text: 其實我沒有在講這個前公司的壞話還是什麼啊
pinyin: qí shí wǒ méi yǒu zài jiǎng zhè gè qián gōng sī de huài huà hái shì shén me a
english: Actually, I'm not talking bad about this former company or anything.

text: 我覺得這個就是我要呈現的內容的藝術啦
pinyin: wǒ jué dé zhè gè jiù shì wǒ yào chéng xiàn de nèi róng de yì shù la
english: I think this is the art of the content I want to present.

text: 是跟我之前做內容創作的東西是很相似的
pinyin: shì gēn wǒ zhī qián zuò nèi róng chuàng zuò de dōng xī shì hěn xiāng sì de
english: It’s very similar to what I used to do in content creation.

text: 又或者是你自己想要的工作環境的文化哦
pinyin: yòu huò zhě shì nǐ zì jǐ xiǎng yào de gōng zuò huán jìng de wén huà ó
english: Or maybe it’s the culture of the work environment you want?

text: 然後你是沒有辦法可以省略掉這些東西的
pinyin: rán hòu nǐ shì méi yǒu bàn fǎ kě yǐ shěng lüè diào zhè xiē dōng xī de
english: Then there is no way you can omit these things

text: 我會選它的原因是因為它非常靠近我的家
pinyin: wǒ huì xuǎn tā de yuán yīn shì yīn wèi tā fēi cháng kào jìn wǒ de jiā
english: The reason I chose it is because it's very close to my home

text: 我也不知道這支影片會在什麼時候播出
pinyin: wǒ yě bù zhī dào zhè zhī yǐng piàn huì zài shén me shí hòu bō chū
english: I don’t know when this video will be released

text: 我就覺得對我來講是有一點講不過去啦
pinyin: wǒ jiù jué dé duì wǒ lái jiǎng shì yǒu yī diǎn jiǎng bù guò qù la
english: I feel like it’s a bit unreasonable for me.

text: 我有在我的新加坡就職系列裡面分享的
pinyin: wǒ yǒu zài wǒ de xīn jiā pō jiù zhí xì liè lǐ miàn fēn xiǎng de
english: I have shared this in my Singapore job series

text: 再來就是間中所學到的東西到底是什麼
pinyin: zài lái jiù shì jiān zhōng suǒ xué dào de dōng xī dào dǐ shì shén me
english: The next step is what exactly are the things I learned from time to time?

text: 這個也是依據我自己本身之前的經歷啦
pinyin: zhè gè yě shì yī jù wǒ zì jǐ běn shēn zhī qián de jīng lì la
english: This is also based on my own previous experience.

text: 所以這個就是我想跟你們分享的東西啦
pinyin: suǒ yǐ zhè gè jiù shì wǒ xiǎng gēn nǐ men fēn xiǎng de dōng xī la
english: So this is what I want to share with you

text: 就好像老高與小茉莉的那個頻道這樣子
pinyin: jiù hǎo xiàng lǎo gāo yǔ xiǎo mò lì de nà gè pín dào zhè yàng zi
english: Just like the channel between Lao Gao and Little Jasmine

text: 因為其實如果你要我回新加坡工作的話
pinyin: yīn wèi qí shí rú guǒ nǐ yào wǒ huí xīn jiā pō gōng zuò de huà
english: Because actually if you want me to go back to Singapore to work

text: 在這裡我就想跟大家再一次宣布多一次
pinyin: zài zhè lǐ wǒ jiù xiǎng gēn dà jiā zài yí cì xuān bù duō yī cì
english: Here I just want to announce to you one more time

text: 可是如果不同意的話就打一個“2”給我知道
pinyin: kě shì rú guǒ bù tóng yì de huà jiù dǎ yī gè “2” gěi wǒ zhī dào
english: But if you don't agree, just give me a "2"

text: 所以在馬來西亞的內容創作圈子裡面噢
pinyin: suǒ yǐ zài mǎ lái xī yà de nèi róng chuàng zuò quān zi lǐ miàn ō
english: So in the content creation circle in Malaysia

text: 純粹分享我自己的觀點跟自己的意見
pinyin: chún cuì fēn xiǎng wǒ zì jǐ de guān diǎn gēn zì jǐ de yì jiàn
english: I am purely sharing my own views and opinions

text: 所以今年我還是決定會在這邊試一試
pinyin: suǒ yǐ jīn nián wǒ hái shì jué dìng huì zài zhè biān shì yī shì
english: So this year I decided to give it a try here

text: 我到底在這幾個月裡面發生什麼事情
pinyin: wǒ dào dǐ zài zhè jǐ gè yuè lǐ miàn fā shēng shén me shì qíng
english: What happened to me in the past few months?

text: 如果喜歡這支影片的話就給我一個「讚」
pinyin: rú guǒ xǐ huān zhè zhī yǐng piàn de huà jiù gěi wǒ yī gè 「 zàn 」
english: If you like this video, please give me a "like"

text: 管理階層裡面會傳出很大很大的聲音
pinyin: guǎn lǐ jiē céng lǐ miàn huì chuán chū hěn dà hěn dà de shēng yīn
english: There will be loud, loud voices coming from the management

text: 從低爬到高的整個過程來的精彩的多
pinyin: cóng dī pá dào gāo de zhěng gè guò chéng lái de jīng cǎi de duō
english: The whole process of climbing from low to high is much more exciting.

text: 就會把自己的頻道搞到非常的商業化
pinyin: jiù huì bǎ zì jǐ de pín dào gǎo dào fēi cháng de shāng yè huà
english: He will make his channel very commercialized

text: 然後自然而然我們的收入也受影響啦
pinyin: rán hòu zì rán ér rán wǒ men de shōu rù yě shòu yǐng xiǎng la
english: Then naturally our income is also affected.

text: 給到你一件很難去完成的事情的時候
pinyin: gěi dào nǐ yī jiàn hěn nán qù wán chéng de shì qíng de shí hòu
english: When you are given something difficult to accomplish

text: 這樣子講可能有一些人會覺得很可笑
pinyin: zhè yàng zi jiǎng kě néng yǒu yī xiē rén huì jué dé hěn kě xiào
english: Some people may find it ridiculous to put it this way.
